original: Edfeldt, Olle Pontus Alvar, sanatorieläkare, Dals-Rostock, f. 18/9/08 ^ i Ystad av ombudsm. Ernst E. o. Maja Andersson. G. 37 m. Gunnel Nilsson. Barn: Göran f. 43, Håkan 44. — Stud:-ex. i Ystad 27, med. kand. i Lund 31, med. lic. där 36. E. o. aman. v. far-makolog. inst. i Lund 29-30, assi&t :läk. v. med. klin. där 35 o. 37, tf. stads-läk. i Hjo 37, tf. und :läk. v. Sundas-valls san. 36, andre und:läk. där 37-38, förste 38, andre und.däk. v. Sundsv. las. med. avd. 40-43, und:läk. v. Lunds las. lungklin. 44-45, överläk. v. Kroppefjälls san. sed. 46.
translated: Edfeldt, Olle Pontus Alvar, sanatorium physician, Dals-Rostock, born on September 18, 1908 in Ystad to representatives Ernst E. and Maja Andersson. Married in 1937 to Gunnel Nilsson. Children: Göran born in 1943, Håkan in 1944. He passed his student's certificate exam in Ystad in 1927, received a Bachelor of Medicine degree in Lund in 1931, and a medical license there in 1936. He was an assistant at the Department of Pharmacology in Lund in 1929-1930, assistant physician at the Medical Clinic there in 1935 and 1937, acting city physician in Hjo in 1937, acting assistant physician at the Sundsvall Sanatorium in 1936, assistant physician there in 1937-1938, senior assistant physician at the Sundsvall Hospital Medical Department in 1940-1943, assistant physician at the Lund Hospital Lung Clinic in 1944-1945, and chief physician at the Kroppefjäll Sanatorium since 1946.
